channel.title: 知足常乐
channel.description: Recent content on 知足常乐

item.title: Blog
item.description: This is the first try to create an article to show on my website. How can I change the order of the side-list? –> Use ‘weight’ ! I shall not change the ‘date’ casually, and be careful of ‘Drafts’, ‘Expired’ and ‘Future’. It doesn’t support LaTex inherently.

item.title: 中文
item.description: 一个人死了，还会有人想起他，就算不错。 —— 汪曾祺 做了人类想成仙；生在地上要上天。 —— 鲁迅 科学工作千万不能固执己见。缺乏勇于认错的精神，是会吃大亏的。 —— 钱学森

item.title: English
item.description: Information is physical. by Rolf Landauer As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain; and as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality. by Albert Einstein (translated by George Barker Jeffery and Wilfrid Perrett) The opposite of a profound truth may well be another profound truth. by Niels Bohr I do think that quantum computers will have transformative effects on society eventually, but these may still be decades away.
